fullDescription.text: A constraint of a CrySL rule is violated, e.g., a key is generated with the wrong key size.
Reported when a value was found to be of a certain reference type: For example, a character array containing a password should never be converted from a String
Reported when a value was found to be of a certain reference type: For example, a character array containing a password should never be converted from a String
An object A expects an object B to have been used correctly (CrySL blocks REQUIRES and ENSURES). For example a Cipher object requires a SecretKey object to be correctly and securely generated.
A constraint of a CrySL rule is violated, e.g., a key is generated with the wrong key size.

The usage of an object may be incomplete: For example a Cipherobject may be initialized but never used for en- or decryption, this may render the code dead. This error heavily depends on the computed call graph (CHA by default)
An object A expects an object B to have been used correctly (CrySL blocks REQUIRES and ENSURES). For example a Cipher object requires a SecretKey object to be correctly and securely generated.
A constraint of a CrySL rule is violated, e.g., a key is generated with the wrong key size.

message.text: First parameter should never be of type java.lang.String..
message.richText: NeverTypeOfError violating CrySL rule for javax.crypto.spec.PBEKeySpec.

message.text: First parameter (with value "PBKDF2WithHmacSHA1") should be any of {PBKDF2WithHmacSHA512, PBKDF2WithHmacSHA384, PBKDF2WithHmacSHA256, PBKDF2WithHmacSHA224, PBEWithHmacSHA512AndAES_128, PBEWithHmacSHA384AndAES_128, PBEWithHmacSHA384AndAES_128, PBEWithHmacSHA224AndAES_128, PBEWithHmacSHA256AndAES_128, PBEWithHmacSHA224AndAES_256, PBEWithHmacSHA256AndAES_256, PBEWithHmacSHA384AndAES_256, PBEWithHmacSHA512AndAES_256}.
message.richText: ConstraintError violating CrySL rule for javax.crypto.SecretKeyFactory.

message.text: First parameter was not properly generated as specced Key.
message.richText: RequiredPredicateError violating CrySL rule for javax.crypto.SecretKeyFactory.

message.text: Operation on object of type javax.crypto.spec.PBEKeySpec object not completed. Expected call to clearPassword.
message.richText: IncompleteOperationError violating CrySL rule for javax.crypto.spec.PBEKeySpec.

message.text: Second parameter was not properly generated as randomized.
message.richText: RequiredPredicateError violating CrySL rule for javax.crypto.spec.PBEKeySpec.

message.text: Third parameter (with value 256)Variable iterationCountmust be  at least 10000.
message.richText: ConstraintError violating CrySL rule for javax.crypto.spec.PBEKeySpec.

message.text: Second parameter should never be of type java.lang.String..
message.richText: NeverTypeOfError violating CrySL rule for java.security.KeyStore.

message.text: First parameter (with value "MD5") should be any of {SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512}.
message.richText: ConstraintError violating CrySL rule for java.security.MessageDigest.
